title: Grenfell Tower Fire, London
title_page: Grenfell Tower Fire, London - The New York Times
maintext:
Britain’s deadliest fire in more than a century raced from floor to floor, forcing residents to decide: Wait for rescuers or try to escape?
By Troy Griggs , Mika Gröndahl , Josh Keller , Jasmine C. Lee , Anjali Singhvi , Megan Specia , Derek Watkins and
